name: Brownfinger
overview: An action\party game for two players in simultaneous competitive play. One player is on the left of the screen, the other on the right. Both need to stay off the pot, this game created for the Craptastic 2022 competition gets this one right on the nose, the brown nose, that is. Jump to avoid the porcelain sitters that scream at you like Montezuma's ghost. Jump to grab the bog roll, you'll need it! The one who runs away with the most points at the end wins!
